Create /var/adm/.information file

  1. Create a file /var/adm/.information which explains the host's role and mksysb target e.g.
    mkdir -p /var/adm ; vi /var/adm/.information

    Enter these details 

    mksysbhost:
location:
rack:
virtual:
virtualization:
physhost:

function:
asset owner:

application owner:

status:Active
part number:

rack position:
private IP: N/A
mac address:
wwn:

warranty end date:

warranty type:
maintenance start date:
maintenance end date:
